title: To the Victor Goes the Spoiled
description: With Expert Witness Alton Brown! Natalie brings the case against her husband Hugo. She wants to throw food away when she decides it's spoiled or too old. Hugo hates waste, and is aghast that Natalie throws away moldy but "perfectly usable" items. Who is right? Who is wrong?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
